We are happy to announce that support staff from the HPC cluster Dardel will be coming to our next 3 bees session.
 
Dardel is a high performance cluster that is part of the National Academic Infrastructure for Supercomputing in Sweden (NAISS), a resource free and open to anyone within Sweden.
 
This coming session is for everyone who works on Dardel, or who is planning on using the system soon. After an introduction to the system and how to use it there will be time for questions and for feedback from current users. So please come with your comments and questions!

**Topic:** Introduction to Dardel and question time \
**When:** Monday, 5th of May, 10:00 \
**Where:** Camput Ultuna, MÃ¥negarm
and online via **[Zoom](https://slu-se.zoom.us/j/69486568642)**  (Password: 410 410)

**Preparation:** No preparation needed, but you are welcome to come with any questions and issues you came across while working with Dardel.

The material will be available on [Github](https://github.com/SLUBioinformaticsInfrastructure/Three_Bees_Workshop_Series) after the session.
